name: George II - the missing tool
description:
This is another story about George, a construction worker assistant. In his last task, he needed to go on three construction sites to collect the work tools of the other lazy workers. Now, he needs to go to another construction site, an eight-floor building, the tallest of the city, to look for another missing tool for his -- also lazy -- boss.

Design and music by Anselmo A. Peretto.

Brains Out Games
